SELECT id, record_date, category, price FROM price_trends WHERE 1 = 1
AND category LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.category},'%')
ORDER BY record_date DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date_series.date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, COALESCE(AVG(pt.price), 0) as price FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL (a.a + (10 * b.a)) DAY) as date FROM (SELECT 0 as a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) as a CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 as a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) as b ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 14 ) as date_series LEFT JOIN price_trends pt ON DATE_FORMAT(pt.record_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(date_series.date, '%Y-%m-%d') AND pt.category = '牛肉' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date_series.date, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY date_series.date ASC
